weatherSuggestion.clear: Feels like a good time to go out

weatherSuggestion.drizzle: Better have an umbrella in your bag
weatherSuggestion.dust: Wear a mask to protect your lungs
weatherSuggestion.fog: Stay safe and enjoy the moody atmosphere!

weatherSuggestion.mist: Stay safe and enjoy the moody atmosphere!
weatherSuggestion.rain: A sturdy umbrella would be fine

weatherSuggestion.snow: An ideal day to build a snowman
weatherSuggestion.thunderstorm: Stay safe and hang on tight!
weatherSuggestion.tornado: Stay indoors and take shelter in a safe room
